import React from'react';import'./animatii.css';// Asigură-te că acest fișier CSS este în același folder cu componenta
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WelcomeAnimation=()=>{const text="Bine a-ți venit";const characters=text.split('');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"welcome-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"fly-in-text",children:characters.map((char,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{style:{animationDelay:"".concat(index*0.1,"s"),fontSize:'52px',fontFamily:'cursive'},className:"text-white font-cursive",children:char!==' '?char:'\u00A0'},index))})});};export default WelcomeAnimation;
